attributes.action: decrease the threshold of the 50% income tax band to be introduced in April 2010 to £125,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is completely immoral for those earning over £125,000 to stay in the 40% band of taxation considering that they have an obligation to aid the less well off in this most troubled of times. With this extra money, the Prime Minister and his government could help to carry on public spending.
